message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe is of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $14,000.  It's a great deal, considering its worth to me is significantly higher. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,500 is still a bit below what I'm looking for. I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can make this work!
